Seth & Jason’s Incredible 10K Circus

Roll up! Roll up ladies and gentlemen!

The incredible Type-rope Walker and his indominatable sidekick the Fearless Pixel-tamer are here to amaze your eyes and blow your minds with their magnificent, and heroic, acts of web-trickery.

Furthermore

Our magnificent marquee is now open for business! If you’re looking for something out of the ordinary, to amaze and astound your friends and neighbours, please get in touch.

@nternetinspired & @JasonHorsefight, AKA Cowbell Fever Design, as an entry to the 10K Apart competition.
